data.expected_result: There should be an error message saying: "Maximum number of guild channels reached (500)" like on the Android version
data.short_description: No error message when attempting to create the 501st channel in a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Manage Channels permission in a server with 500 channels (please DM me for an invite) - Try creating the 501st channel and notice how there's no error message
